ygData.subject: Re: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, first off, shadow step is a very handy spell, hate to see it get replaced. Voice graft is as worthless to the SK as it is to the necros. Lifetaps are not
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, first off, shadow step is a very handy spell, hate to see it get
replaced. Voice graft is as worthless to the SK as it is to the necros.
Lifetaps are not going to be what some here envision. I think you will find
them worthless after level 20, expecially if they fall 2 ranks behind that
of the necro. I would still trade voice graft for anything. Shadow step has
saved my arse more than once, and I would miss this spell.
I think they are fine as they are, but if you want to add a new spell, make
it a DOT, a damage spell. I mean, what are you going to do with a lifetap?
After the battle, run around and zap spiderlings till your healed up? This
would be the only use. The spell is too slow to cast when your in melee. I
would trade the pet and the Voice graft/other useless spells for another
stackable DOT spell. The damage shield would be awesome too, but this musta
made the SK class too powerful, thats why it was removed.
My 2 coppers

Morgul the Black
----- Original Message -----
